Chapter 19 

     7-9 (Ephesians 5:23-25; see EGW on ch. 7:9). God the Husband of His Church.--God is the husband of His church. The church is the bride, the Lamb's wife. Every true believer 
                                                                           986
is a part of the body of Christ. Christ regards unfaithfulness shown to Him by His people as the unfaithfulness of a wife to her husband. We are to remember that we are members of Christ's body (Letter 39, 1902).
